general_advisory: Keep your crop field free from weed to minimize the incidence of diseases and pests. Apply balanced and appropriate fertilizers according to the cropâ€™s growth stage. Regular monitoring of the crop for incidence of pests and diseases should be done. Follow safety measures during the application of chemical pesticides and apply the recommended doses in the correct method with attention to wind direction.

advisory: Complete sowing of pre-germinated treated seeds in puddled soil by broadcasting or drum seeder and maintain proper water for seedling growth
